Method Detail

get

public static WidgetManager get()

addWidget

public void addWidget(Widget widget)
Registers a new widget so that it is assigned a reference code and is able to receive input. Adding a Widget triggers the generation of reference codes for that Widget. The same Widget object can be added multiple times. If the options for that widget have changed, new reference codes may be assigned.

Parameters:
widget - The Widget to register.
See Also:
org.instantplaces.purewidgets.shared.widgetmanager.WidgetManagerInterface#addWidget(org.instantplaces.purewidgets.shared.widgets.WidgetInterface)
